title: Public Procurement Contract Status Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for the lifecycle status of public procurement contracts.

terms.label: Pending Signature
terms.definition: A contract has been awarded but is not yet signed or fully executed by all required parties.

terms.label: Active
terms.definition: A contract is in force and performance or delivery is ongoing according to agreed terms and conditions.

terms.label: Suspended
terms.definition: Execution of the contract is temporarily halted, for example due to legal challenges, funding issues, or performance concerns.

terms.label: Terminated
terms.definition: The contract has been ended before its planned completion date, whether by mutual agreement, default, or other cause.

terms.label: Completed
terms.definition: The contract has reached its planned end date, and all obligations have been substantially fulfilled to the extent recorded by the buyer.

terms.label: Other Contract Status
terms.definition: A contract status that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but is necessary for alignment with source systems.
